TextBlock.Text: TULIP: The <color=orange>miniature</color> systems are coming towards our vessel faster then we thought. What if we do not finish the SSPU on time?
FERN: Fret not, Tulip. If any Nomai or sentient being is from those systems, we can simply add safegaurds to the SSPU.
FERN: We have many scrolls, after all.
BASIL: Hypothesis: It would be beneficial for all of us if you stopped worrying about the simplest things.
